ygData.subject: Start of a prophecy...
ygData.msgSnippet: At the Shadow Detiny, Melchana was training with Tankor and Belthassan had been meditating in the Matrix chamber about the small disturbance he had felt

Subject: Start of a prophecy...

At the Shadow Detiny, Melchana was training with Tankor and Belthassan 
had been meditating in the Matrix chamber about the small disturbance 
he had felt earlier. Then, the huge wave came...

Melchana stopped right there, her face obviously showing fear. She 
fell to her knees, unable to pronounce even a word.

Belthassan's eyes opened wide. This could not be happening. There was 
no way such a thing could be!!!!

Daemos suddenly came out of the parallel state he had been into since 
the reformatting. He screamed like a possessed being. His shout 
resonated throughout the base.

Gesper's voice came on the speakers.

Belthassan: ...yes! Of course we felt it! It... It... That cannot be 
possible! Such a power! It is impossible! Only something as vast as 
the Matrix could unleash such thing!

Gesper: So what should we do?

Belthassan: It seems this was done by Infecticons. They offer us the 
chance to join or die. I heard you were with the Autobots. Tell them 
about this and then ask them about what they plan to do. Prophetus 
would be needed in such a time of crisis, but you have to attend to 
other business.

Melchana arrived in the Matrix chamber followed by Tankor:
Who in the Matrix are these Infecticons anyways?

Daemos:
They are worthy warriors, and dangerous players in this war...

They all turned to him. None of them had heard him enter.

Belthassan:
You are finally awake, friend! How do you know them so well?

Daemos: ....This... slumber... I was in... The Matrix retained me in 
this state. It told me about them... As co-commander of the 
Tripredacus, I order that we do not yield to this enemy. To do 
otherwise would be heresy to our cause.

Belthassan: DAEMOS! There is no reason for us to become their enemy! 
As co-commander of this mission, I declare that this order is voided!

Daemos: Fine then. I have no more choice than to declare myself 
commander of the Tripredacus. Anyone who defies me will have to face 
me in a honor dual. I am sorry I have to do so, my friend, but if that 
is the only way to let the Matrix live on, then so be it.

Daemos: Gesper, this is Daemos, your new and only commander. This is a 
dire time for the Matrix. Tell the Autobots about our cause and our 
reasons. They can help us.
